newsID0.title: Bad News
newsID0.text: This are only demo news since loading external JSON files will violate the same-origin policy. A possible solution is the usage of JSONP that the server must                provide.

newsID1.title: Ticker News
newsID1.text: By using the 'ticker' tag news will be shown (only) as a scrolling ticker.

newsID4.title: Extensions
newsID4.text: In future extensions such as links or images might be added to news.
